Description:
Wide and Elevated
This freestanding Edwardian residence on a large 220 sqm allotment combines picture-book period appeal, light-filled contemporary style and a prime address close to Yarra parkland, primary schools and CBD transport. Elevated from the street, here is a captivating home offering 2 double bedrooms with quality BIRs, an ultra spacious living and dining room with french doors, a glass encased entertainer's kitchen and/meals area (including premium appliances and, stone benchtops) with streams of northerly light, a stylishly refitted bathroom with dual walk-in shower, plus separate laundry. The sunny north facing courtyard, with garden storage/2nd WC and potential car access via rear right-of-way, forms a welcoming backdrop to this immaculate home featuring polished Baltic floors, OFPs and other period detail, ducted heating and refrigerated air conditioning.
Insights: 133 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Vibrant village living on the city edge
With all the conveniences of village life on your doorstep, this ideally located town residence (no owners corporation) offers a contemporary, low-maintenance lifestyle in a sought-after inner-city location. The double-storey floorplan features open-plan living with hardwood floors and an atrium ceiling that injects light and provides sky views. The well-appointed kitchen impresses with stunning marble benches and Blanco appliances, the sun-soaked main bedroom gets city views, a private balcony and WIR, and shares a 2-way bathroom (marble vanity) with a second bedroom (BIRs).
Angled features create designer edge and a secure front courtyard is a perfect introduction to modern living.
Further features include a sep. laundry with second WC, storage, ducted heating, air-conditioning on both levels, and off-street parking.
Close to the station, shops, the Darling Gardens and Yarra trails, city living has never been so easy.
Insights: 1 John Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Versatile entertainer near parklands
This outstanding warehouse conversion featuring 2 top-floor terraces for amazing alfresco entertaining. Superbly situated for a wonderful inner-city lifestyle just moments to Yarra parkland and trails, cafes, shops and train station; this brilliant multi-level residence with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (BIRs; main with ensuite) offers floorplan flexibility with large extra living space easily operating as a ground-floor home office. Features open-plan living and dining area with striking wave ceiling, granite kitchen including Smeg/Bosch appliances, laundry, balcony, reverse-cycle air-conditioning, panel heating, polished hardwood floors, video intercom security and 2-car remote-control garage (internal).
Insights: 6/176 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious entertainer in prime position
This town residence presents effortless light-filled modern living with inspiring views and a versatile floorplan. A first-floor living zone is designed to impress with a corner position that injects light from three directions and two outdoor terraces that create an indoor-outdoor living experience. Beautifully finished interiors include a marble island bench with waterfall edges and white 2pac cabinetry that perfectly offset stunning Japanned floorboards. A private alfresco terrace makes for an exceptional entertainment domain. The black floors give way to grey carpet in the three upstairs bedrooms, and the two stylish bathrooms are fully tiled with stone-topped vanities. A ground-floor rumpus/4th bedroom could also suit a home office with an impressive entry foyer. The auto tandem garage with polished concrete floors and internal access provides even more scope. Extra features: video intercom, ducted heating, R/C cooling, 2 additional powder rooms. Steps from the village shops, cafes, parks and the train station, spacious and modern executive living never looked so good.
Insights: 2 Spensley Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Innovative, light-filled living in parkside pocket
Immaculate from its flawless Edwardian facade to an architect-designed extension, this renovated period house on 240m2 (approx) is pure perfection throughout. The textured, well-finished space defined by floods of northern light and stylish modern interiors feature polished concrete floors, a white palette, timber highlights and full-height glass sliders to a landscaped garden for an indoor-outdoor lifestyle. Enjoy alfresco dining on the deck set amongst established trees and entertaining around the Smeg and stone kitchen with a herb garden at your fingertips.
High ceilings soar overhead in three bedrooms, including a main bedroom with concealed ensuite and stained glass detail, and the sophisticated fully tiled bathroom with stone-toped vanity will definitely impress.
With an OFP, R/C cooling, bedroom heaters, BIRs, Euro laundry, and walking distance to the Darling Gardens, Yarra parklands, shops, cafes and the station, this accomplished package ticks every box.
Insights: 93 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Smart parkside apartment with city views
Enjoying one of Clifton Hill's most highly sought-after parkland positions, this smart 2nd-floor apartment with an exceptional address is brimming with lifestyle bonuses featuring superb city to Studley Park views plus prized remote-control garage. Quietly and privately nestled in coveted 'Clifton View Apartments', this brilliant investment and affordable low-maintenance home presents a wonderful inner-city lifestyle opportunity with tranquil Merri Creek parks and trails at the doorstep and cafes, shops and train station nearby. This irresistible apartment offers 1 double bedroom with built-in robes, stylish living/dining room, kitchen, bathroom, laundry taps, panel heating, matte-finished parquetry floor, high ceilings and secure intercom entry.

Description:
Ground Floor, Park Outlook Refurbished One Bedroom
This front of block ground floor apartment soaks up the northern sun and overlooks the Merri Creek park lands across Heidelberg Rd.
Whilst you'd expect some noise it mainly washes over the upper levels, but hey inner city demands a bit of noise.
A genuinely spacious 1 bed apartment with a good size lounge with large northern window, well maintained kitchen and bathroom with laundry facilities and double bedroom with robes.
Recently painted, new blinds, air-conditioning installed making a great first buy or investment with expected rents between $290-310 per week depending upon time of year.
You'll stroll to the CBD express train, take in the delights of Spensley Village or Queens Pde or ride a bike along the greenbelt trails.
Oh, did we mention an under croft car space?
Insights: 2/109 Heidelberg Road, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 12 other 1 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Home in Prized Position
Perfectly positioned in a blue chip Clifton Hill location this elevated two bedroom apartment offers easy access to an impressive assortment of Melbourne's finest lifestyle options & attractions with just a few minutes walk to the cafes and boutiques of Queens Parade, the beautiful Darling Gardens, Merri Creek trails and a number of transport options direct to the CBD.
Light and bright with a sunny, North facing aspect this property enjoys a generous outdoor terrace off the open plan living. The fully equipped kitchen with gas cooking and plenty of storage space adjoins the living but is neatly tucked away. Off the hall are two bedrooms each with built in robes and a modern, central bathroom. The apartment has been freshly painted and carpeted throughout and is ready to be called home.
A secure undercover car space completes the package. This wonderful low maintenance property would be a perfect first home or addition to your investment portfolio.
* Two bedrooms with built-in robes
* Large North facing terrace
* Secure car space on title
* Short walk to trains and trams
Insights: 25H Grant Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2019 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Large courtyard garden
This two-bedroom apartment is defined by polished, modern living set in a tranquil village-style setting, complete with access to a swimming pool set in the complex's landscaped grounds.
Spacious, light-filled interiors are enhanced by two outdoor settings. Private and secure on the ground floor, the north-facing living zone equipped with Lofra S/S appliances and Bosch dishwasher opens out to a leafy alfresco. Two bedrooms (BIRs) share a sparkling main bathroom with Euro laundry and look out to the rear courtyard garden, which is a private retreat with entertainment deck. Including intercom entry, split-system heating/cooling & off-street parking, this is an exceptional package in an inner-city location surrounded by expansive parklands close to cycling tracks, trains, cafes & the Eastern Freeway.
Insights: 2/5 William Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Potential to impress in the perfect position
Potential is written all over this perfectly positioned extra wide 3 bedroom terrace - potential to renovate, potential city views and potential to be the best! Currently comfortable offering large proportions, period features and north-facing rear courtyard with auto roller door ROW; this solid semi-detached Victorian with slate roof is ready to reward renovators looking to create a stylish inner-city haven near Queens Parade cafes, Smith/Brunswick Streets, Darling & Edinburgh Gardens, trams and schools. A classic period profile precedes deep, wide arched hallway, living room, functional kitchen and meals area, modern bathroom, laundry, WC, heating/cooling, high ceiling roses and workshop. An outstanding opportunity to consider the options and write your own success story in this popular street close to Queens Parade, Clifton Hill & St Johns Primary Schools.
Insights: 42 Hodgkinson Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2020 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Parkland Views
With its spacious design and quality features throughout, this impressive three-level residence offers an exceptional lifestyle/investment opportunity in a sublime city-edge location overlooking the wide open spaces of Ramsden Street Reserve. Immaculate interior comprises 3 bedrooms (master with stylish ensuite) and two-way main bathroom, light-filled open-design living and dining areas complemented by a well-appointed kitchen with dishwasher. Add to this ducted heating and split-system a/c, double-glazed windows all-round, laundry/powder room (third WC), plus stacker doors (from the living area) to a delightfully-private courtyard garden with paved entertaining area, rain-sensing Vergola, storage shed and secure off-street parking via ROW. Instant access to acres of parkland and endless kilometres of Merri Creek/Yarra River bike trails, it's also close to public transport (trains, buses and trams) as well as some of inner-Melbourne's best cafe/shopping precincts.
Agent - hockingstuart
Charles Atkins : 0405 287 112
Insights: 67 Field Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Three or Two Bedroom Residence - The Choice Is Yours!
Tucked away at the rear, in a boutique block of only Nine residences, is a wonderful opportunity to enjoy a spaciously private corner townhouse. This immaculate and light-filled home boasts a versatile floorplan with two/three bedrooms or large study, two bathrooms (master with ensuite), formal living/dining area and a north facing open plan casual lounge/dining zone with both living areas accessing their own courtyards. Featuring large north-facing rear entertainment area, remote-control two-car off-street parking, high ceilings and ducted heating. This superb townhouse also includes well-appointed kitchen, main bathroom with bath, concealed laundry, built-in-robes and exceptional storage throughout. An exciting low-maintenance home in secure block with stunning garden settings close to cafes, shops, trails and train station leaves you wanting for nothing more.
Julie Susnjara : 0408 006 662
Insights: 2/146 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Spacious Apartment opposite the Darling Gardens
With a prime Clifton Hill address close to Queens Parade and Clifton Hill Train Station, this large ground floor apartment offers beautifully proportioned light-filled living and generous north facing courtyard with views to the Darling Gardens. In a well-maintained block of 12, here is a great first home, wise investment or downsize opportunity, comprising a spacious L-shaped living and dining room, modern kitchen, two generous bedrooms (BIRs), central bathroom, laundry & off-street parking on title.

Description:
Spacious Victorian with scope to extend
The Clifton Hill Village cul-de-sac location of this delightful garden-set Victorian offers exceptional lifestyle prospects with its fabulous focus on nearby parklands, local amenities and a community-minded spirit. Enjoying a northern orientation and character-filled interior; deep native-inspired garden providing the perfect welcome to a lovely single-level layout featuring 2 double bedrooms with BIRs and large, flowing living and dining areas with open fireplaces. Stroll to Merri Creek trails, cafes, shops, school and train station from this solid brick period home also includes gas heating, polished hardwood floorboards, ceiling roses, covered alfresco area, sunny landscaped rear courtyard garden and roller door ROW. Further opportunity to improve STCA.

Description:
Rare Village Opening with Outstanding Scope
Victorian terraces such as this long-held classic are becoming increasingly rare because of the central Clifton Hill location, great land size and perfect potential. Comfortably maintained by the same family for over 50 years, this immaculate solid brick home with large north-facing rear garden and roller door ROW is ripe for rejuvenation or reinvention delivering outstanding scope to improve when ready. An inner-city cottage of impressive proportions, create a stylish modern environment to exactly fit your needs and enjoy future lifestyle excellence surrounded by popular cafe and shopping strips, Darling Gardens, schools, recreation centre, train station and Yarra Bend parkland at the end of the street. Includes arched hallway, two double bedrooms, living room, dining room, kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, quality bathroom, big laundry and ducted heating. Land: 278 sqm approx.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
Ideal opportunity with extra space in an excellent position
Superbly set on a deep block with rear off-street parking; discover an outstanding opportunity with this Hawthorn brick terrace offering rich lifestyle rewards just metres to Darling Gardens. With lounge room, living room and large dining area, there's plenty of priceless space to enjoy with this character-filled Victorian complemented by ducted heating, reverse-cycle air-conditioning, polished Baltic pine floors, open fireplaces and high period ceilings. Stake a sizable inner-city claim with this delightful 2 bedroom home central to Queens Parade, Smith/Brunswick Streets and train station that offers well-appointed kitchen, bright bathroom, separate laundry, French doors and private rear courtyard garden.
Insights: 136 Gold Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Delightful well-situated Victorian
This light-filled residence says 'welcome!' as soon as you step onto its Baltic-floored hallway. Refurbished to fuse period grace with modern style, this picturesque terrace cottage offers 2 double bedrooms, a spacious living and dining room with French doors to a brick-paved sideway, well-equipped kitchen with bay-windowed meals area flowing to a leafy al fresco entertaining courtyard, period style bathroom and laundry. Close to Yarra parkland and Clifton Hill Village, this immaculate home features charming period detail, split-system air conditioning, ducted heating and garden storage.

Description:
Spacious with park views
This classically proportioned modern residence has one of Clifton Hill's finest positions, close to schools, Village cafes and station, with an unrivalled Yarra parkland outlook. Designed for light-filled low maintenance living, it has a versatile floor plan comprising 4 bedrooms (ensuite and WIR to main) plus generous landing/study space opening to balcony, a very spacious living and dining room with OFP, large well-equipped kitchen, main bathroom, powder room and laundry. Including a private northerly courtyard, side garden, off-street parking and LU garage, this immaculate home features polished timber floors & city views.
Insights: 42 Wright Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Light-Filled & Free-Flowing Village Victorian
Beautifully balancing period and modern styles in a quiet village street, this attractive Victorian reveals a superbly designed interior delivering light and flow from classic facade to fabulous courtyard garden. 'Dowra' is a delightful Hawthorn brick terrace of impressive proportions introduced by arched hallway and two bedroom layout that opens up to a large living and dining zone capturing glorious leafy aspects through a brilliant rear window wall. Perfect for indoor-outdoor entertaining, this inviting home includes kitchen with Blanco/Bosch appliances, bright spa bathroom with ensuite access, laundry area, central heating, reverse-cycle air-conditioning, polished hardwood floors, OFPs, attic storage and rear laneway access. Conveniently set near Darling Gardens, train station, shopping, cafes and schools.
Andrew Simondson : 0412 999 128
Insights: 44 Myrtle Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.
